Dishes are somewhat small but prices are still reasonable. They have an open kitchen and the decor is very modern, clean and tasteful.

comment_list.author: Chad Hardy
comment_list.comment: We just went there for lunch, we were seated at our table, nobody offered to get us drinks. We have a person in our group who cannot eat seafood. We asked if they could remove the oyster sauce and the shrimp paste from two items on the menu ‚Ä¶

comment_list.author: Preston Dukes

comment_list.author: Ross Macaluso
comment_list.comment: Really great dim sum spot. Try the fried taro scallop dish, and make sure you check out their desserts. It is a bit pricey compared to more local favorities but the location, and decor justify the added cost. Definitely worth a try if you wanna get out of the humidity and need a quick bite.

comment_list.author: Chi Nhan Phan
comment_list.comment: Very good Chinese restaurant. Especially the dumplings.

comment_list.author: William Cao
comment_list.comment: Delicious Chinese food especially roasting duck however it could be noisy when it gets more crowded. 4 stars for quality and sophisticated preparation.

comment_list.author: Alex Glez
comment_list.comment:
The quality of the food is certainly not worth it for the exorbitant price this place has. The pork I had was dry, not cooked properly. The soup had no interesting flavor...

The staff was nice, and the place looks quite neat, so there is thay
